page.title: 01Today 31.5.85. By Martyn
page.content: On Thursday I got up at 06.30. I got washed at 07.55. Then I watched "Breakfast-time". I got dressed. We had breakfast of cornflakes and toast at 08.00. After breakfast I went upstairs and brushed my teeth and hair. Then I went to School. I arrived at School at 08.40 and played outside until assembly at 09.10. We started lessons at 09.30. At 10.30 we had break. Afterwards we watched,"Animals in Action," on the video. We had dinner at 12.00. At dinner break I practised running with an egg and spoon. Afternoon school started at 13.15. I got home at about 15.30.Later I watched T.V. We had tea at 17.50. At 20.00 I was sent upstairs because Mum had a playschool committee meeting. I watched T.V. until 21.35 when I went to bed.My date of birth is 25.9.74.
